    src/index.js

    import Inf from './Interface';
import Impl from './WebImplement';
import EventEmitter from '@bone/event-emitter';
import { CHANNEL, CHANNEL_MESSAGE, CHANNEL_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE } from './constants';

// 构造bridge
class FakeBridge {
    constructor(){
        Object.assign(this, EventEmitter);

        const channel = this.channel = new Impl({
            bridge: this
        });

        // delegate event
        channel.on(CHANNEL_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE, (...args)=>{
            this.emit(CHANNEL_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE, ...args);
        });
    }

    call(module, method, args, callback){
        this.channel[method](args, callback);
    }
}

export default new Inf({
    bridge: new FakeBridge
});
